channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: France mulls fast-tracking registered crypto firms to new EU rules
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: France's financial regulator is weighing up “fast track” options for registered firms so they can be compliant with MiCA rules as soon as possible.

item.title: ‘Crypto is dead in America’: Tech billionaire Chamath Palihapitiya
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: Palihapitiya did concede the crypto sector has “pushed more boundaries” than other startup sectors which may have attracted the SEC’s attention.

item.title: Judge approves taps on SBF’s parents’ phones to meet bail conditions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Surveillance software installed on Sam Bankman-Fried’s parents’ phones will track every minute of their activity across browsers, messaging and calls.

item.title: Coinbase files court action to compel SEC’s response to rulemaking petition
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Coinbase is looking to force the United States Securities and Exchange Commission to respond to its rulemaking petition seeking rules for the crypto industry, a request that’s been pending since July.

item.title: District 9 director’s shooter, Decentraland red-light district battle: Web3 Gamer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Callan Quinn
item.description: Trouble in Decentraland’s red light district, “no mercy” for Vulcan Forged autoclickers, District 9 director’s immersive blockchain shooter.

item.title: Stablecoins must be programmable to counter CBDCs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nikhil Raghuveera
item.description: Decentralization enables programmability — and that allows stablecoins to wield a key advantage over central bank digital currencies.

item.title: ECB considers digital euro access, distribution in third design progress report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The digital euro, if it is created, will be available to Eurozone users first through familiar onboarding procedures.

item.title: Draft bill suggests separating legislation on payment stablecoins and digital asset markets
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The draft bill no longer included aspects of an earlier version that included legislation of custodial service providers and algorithmic stablecoins, as well as a CBDC study.

item.title: Price analysis 4/24: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, BNB, XRP, ADA, MATIC, DOGE, SOL
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin and select altcoins are at risk of falling below their respective support levels and starting a deeper correction.

item.title: German regulators launch inquiry into ChatGPT GDPR compliance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Germany becomes the latest European nation to officially question OpenAI’s compliance with GDPR.

item.title: Ordinals Finance has conducted a $1M rug pull: CertiK
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The DeFi protocol appears to have erased its social media presence after news of the alleged exit scam broke.

item.title: Ether price struggles to maintain support as regulatory challenges and network issues weigh
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Ether options volume hints at bearish sentiment as the $1,850 support falters.

item.title: Who on Crypto Twitter chose not to pay for a blue checkmark?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Adam Back, Roger Ver, Brad Garlinghouse, and Andreas Antonopoulos were among those not showing a blue checkmark on their Twitter accounts after legacy verification was sunsetted.

item.title: OFAC sanctions OTC traders who converted crypto for North Korea’s Lazarus group
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: U.S. law enforcement has identified three individuals who handled stolen crypto and fiat for the benefit of North Korea.

item.title: DeFi options protocol raises $17M for buy-side marketplace
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The upcoming version will combine aspects of an automated market maker and money market.

item.title: Pan-European crypto regulation is almost here: Law Decoded, Apr 17–24
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The Markets in Crypto-Assets Act, also known as MiCA, was finally passed by the European Parliament.

item.title: Ethereum price lower highs vs. Bitcoin hint at more downside in April
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.description: Institutional investors accumulated Ether and sold off Bitcoin last week, suggesting confidence in Ethereum after the Shapella hard fork.

item.title: Bybit to introduce mandatory KYC requirements starting May 8
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Users without Know Your Customer verification had a daily withdrawal limit of 20,000 USDT on Bybit prior to the announcement.

item.title: Bitcoin price tags new April low as traders weigh odds of $25K next
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin threatens a breakdown below $27,000, and traders are ready and waiting with their downside BTC price targets.

item.title: OpenAI’s CTO says government regulators should be ‘very involved’ in regulating AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The executive recently sounded off about government regulators, the “pause” letter, and how close the company is to reaching artificial general intelligence.

item.title: OKX staff issues clarification amid ‘shell token’ purchase inquiries
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: It appears certain individuals have developed an interest in purchasing listed tokens that no longer have market value or development activity.

item.title: Trust, UX and security in DeFi: Redefining the yield ecosystem with Cake DeFi CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: To bring about much-needed evolution in DeFi, entrepreneurs will need to rethink business strategies to fit investors’ evolving expectations for more than quick returns.

item.title: Binance integrates ChatGPT into its Web3 academy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Binance released a new AI-driven tool that it named the “Binance Sensei” that uses machine learning to generate answers from its education platform to help users learn about Web3.

item.title: Ethereum up 20% in April while Markets Pro sees 379% gain in one day
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: A single Cointelegraph Markets Pro alert delivers a triple-digit winner in 24 hours for crypto traders.

item.title: How to distinguish a good crypto project from a bad one
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ilias Salvatore
item.description: Here are 10 data points to help you figure out whether a project could be worthy of investment, or should be desperately avoided.

item.title: China to expand CBDC use case for Belt and Road Initiative
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: China was one of the first nations to start working on its CBDC. However, despite the completion of its development, the government has yet to officially launch the CBDC.

item.title: The day the last withdrawal is locked
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jae Yang
item.description: One day, you will probably tell your grandchildren about the Wild West days of cryptocurrency.

item.title: KuCoin to reimburse victims of the short-lived Twitter account hack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The crypto exchange announced that it will fully reimburse all the verified asset losses from the fake giveaway promotion.

item.title: LUNA is not a security, South Korean court rules in Terra co-founder’s case
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The court says that It is difficult to see the Luna token as a financial investment product regulated by the Capital Markets Act.

item.title: Romania plugs into Web3 with national NFT marketplace
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Romania’s informatics institute is set to launch an institutional NFT trading platform, using Web3 to create a link between the public and private sectors.
